item.title: Experienced FPV Drone Pilot needed for Track & Field Coaching Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Project Overview
I am seeking a skilled and versatile FPV drone pilot to create high-quality video content focused on athletic coaching. This content will specifically cover how to sprint and apply sprint techniques to sports. The footage will be used for social media and instructional videos on my website.

Role Responsibilities
Videography: Capture high-quality video content using a FPV drone, focusing on athletic drills and techniques. This includes framing, composition, and ensuring smooth motion shots to best capture the dynamic nature of sprinting.

Collaboration: Work closely with me to understand the vision and specific requirements for each shoot, particularly in capturing the nuances of sprinting techniques.

Qualifications
Proficiency with FPV Drones: Experienced in shooting video content with FPV drones, including familiarity with their camera settings and capabilities.

Creativity and Technical Skills: Ability to create visually engaging content that effectively conveys athletic coaching techniques.

Project Details
Focus: Recording and showcasing sprint techniques and their application in sports.

Location:
Marsteller Middle School Track
14000 Sudley Manor Dr, Bristow, VA 20136

Duration: 3 hours per shoot.

Hourly Range: $75.00-$150.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 22:03 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Sports & Recreation, Drone Videography, Videography
Skills: Sports & Recreation, Drone Videography, Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: On-Camera Video Task - $70 - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for someone who’s not camera shy to help with a quick video task. No video editing required!

Pay:
$70 for a short video task

Requirements:

Comfortable being on camera
Reliable and punctual

Budget: $70

Category: Video Production
